EmailTemplate.name: 201910_Americas_Pentastar_DU875_M:1_Engaged_Pilot/DOM_kcr.201910_Americas_Pentas
EmailTemplate.subject: See Honeywell's DU-875 Display in Action!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Want to see the DU-875 display in action? Watch below as Joey Meier, pilot and spotter for NASCAR champion Brad Keselowski, explains the features of Primus Elite and the benefits provided by the brighter, clearer, high-resolution picture on the DU-875 displays.
<[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nJlfjINrFIQ]]>
Get the clearest views! Take advantage of a $35,000 Honeywell trade-in credit per DU-870 display unit you replace, plus take advantage of additional savings on your Honeywell Maintenance Service Plan – Avionics contract. But hurry – these offers end December 31, 2019!
Contact Pentastar Aviation today to learn more or request a quote.
CONTACT PENTASTAR AVIATION <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/DU-875_Upgrade_Pentastar.html?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_ch_amer_bga_pentastar_du875&utm_content=engaged&utm_term=m:1]]>
